epics.title: V0.4-E1 — Global UI Refresh & Design System
epics.body:
Epic Goal:
Establish a modern, consistent UI and a small design system (tokens + components) used across
Clinician, Admin, and Patient areas.

Why:
- Current UI feels outdated and inconsistent.
- We need a shared design language to accelerate future work.

Scope:
- Design tokens (colors, typography, spacing)
- Global layout (header, sidebar, content)
- Core UI components (Buttons, Cards, Tables, Form controls)
- Minimal dark/light mode decision for v0.4

issues.title: Define v0.4 Design Tokens (Colors, Typography, Spacing)
issues.body: Define core design tokens for v0.4 and document them. See planning docs for details.

issues.title: Implement Global App Layout (Header, Sidebar, Content Shell)
issues.body: Implement a global layout component for clinician/admin routes using v0.4 design tokens.
